column4: I'm having troubles connecting to unsecured wireless networks using 8.10 on an Asus Eee 901 (using WICD). I can connect to a WPA2 secured network, but with the unsecured, the logs just keep 'setting dhcp mode' and not optaining an IP
sounds like the network is unsecured but uses mac adress filtering
no, its any unsecured network, including all hotspots
try forcing it into dhcp mode?
